page.title: 07EDUCATION NASH AREA
page.content: Aylesbury Vale is the local Education Authority and still maintains the selective system. PRIMARY - At the age of 5 years most of the children go to the designated Whaddon C of E First School, approximately 3 miles away; transport is provided by the Authority. MIDDLE SCHOOL - At 8 years they transfer to Great Horwood Middle School about 5 miles away. Transport is again provided. In the final year the children take the 12 plus exam. SENIOR SCHOOL - If they pass this exam they have the opportunity to go to the Royal Latin School in Buckingham. The alternative is the Secondary Modern at Winslow or Buckingham. PRIVATE SCHOOLS - Some parents choose private schools which include Thornton Convent, Akeley Wood, Swanbourne and Stowe.
